mainboard.name: Fell
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy target creature.

mainboard.name: The Binding of the Titans
mainboard.oracle_text:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Each player mills three cards.
II — Exile up to two target cards from graveyards. For each creature card exiled this way, you gain 1 life.
III — Return target creature or land card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainboard.name: Chromatic Star
mainboard.oracle_text:
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.
When this artifact is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

mainboard.name: Knight of the Ebon Legion
mainboard.oracle_text:
{2}{B}: This creature gets +3/+3 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if a player lost 4 or more life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. (Damage causes loss of life.)

mainboard.name: Hedge Maze
mainboard.oracle_text:
({T}: Add {G} or {U}.)
This land enters tapped.
When this land enters, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

mainboard.name: Boseiju, Who Endures
mainboard.oracle_text:
{T}: Add {G}.
Channel — {1}{G}, Discard this card: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or nonbasic land an opponent controls. That player may search their library for a land card with a basic land type, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each legendary creature you control.

mainboard.name: Kitesail Freebooter
mainboard.oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. Exile that card until this creature leaves the battlefield.

mainboard.name: Repeal
mainboard.oracle_text:
Return target nonland permanent with mana value X to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.

mainboard.name: Dragonsguard Elite
mainboard.oracle_text:
Magecraft — Whenever you cast or copy an instant or sorcery spell, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.
{4}{G}{G}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature.

mainboard.name: Cut Down
mainboard.oracle_text: Destroy target creature with total power and toughness 5 or less.

mainboard.name: Abundant Harvest
mainboard.oracle_text: Choose land or nonland. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card of the chosen kind. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

mainboard.name: Pile On
mainboard.oracle_text:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Destroy target creature or planeswalker. Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)

mainboard.name: Explore
mainboard.oracle_text:
You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.

mainboard.name: Tarmogoyf
mainboard.oracle_text: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.

mainboard.name: Inexorable Blob
mainboard.oracle_text: Delirium — Whenever this creature attacks, if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard, create a 3/3 green Ooze creature token that's tapped and attacking.

mainboard.oracle_text:
{T}, Pay 1 life: Add {B} or {G}.
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Draw a card.

({T}: Add {B} or {G}.)

mainboard.oracle_text:
Sunburst (This enters with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Destroy each nonland permanent with mana value equal to the number of charge counters on this artifact.

mainboard.name: Utopia Sprawl
mainboard.oracle_text:
Enchant Forest

Whenever enchanted Forest is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of the chosen color.

mainboard.name: Toxic Deluge
mainboard.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life.
All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

mainboard.name: Tamiyo, Compleated Sage
mainboard.oracle_text:
Compleated ({G/U/P} can be paid with {G}, {U}, or 2 life. If life was paid, this planeswalker enters with two fewer loyalty counters.)
+1: Tap up to one target artifact or creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
−X: Exile target nonland permanent card with mana value X from your graveyard. Create a token that's a copy of that card.
−7: Create Tamiyo's Notebook, a legendary colorless artifact token with "Spells you cast cost {2} less to cast" and "{T}: Draw a card."

mainboard.name: Eternal Witness
mainboard.oracle_text: When this creature enters, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

mainboard.name: Sylvan Library
mainboard.oracle_text: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw two additional cards. If you do, choose two cards in your hand drawn this turn. For each of those cards, pay 4 life or put the card on top of your library.

sideboard.name: No More Lies
